snippet.title: Record Tripping - Walkthrough [Recommended]
snippet.description:
A very Unique and special game, in which you have to use the Mouse Scroll to play. I am sorry, but this game is only for those who have a Mouse Scroll! Anyways, this games' Graphics is Awesome and very sweet, and I just love the gameplay. Please try this one if you have a Mouse Scroll, and I hope this Walkthrough helps you :D

Play The Game: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/526324
